title: Vivox Authorization Service
description: Integrate Vivox voice chat into your game with the Vivox Authorization Service. This essential service facilitates secure communication between AccelByte Gaming Services (AGS), Vivox, and your game clients by generating and managing short-lived (90-second) Vivox tokens. Ensure continuous, authenticated voice communication for your players by integrating this robust solution.
creator: AccelByte

repositories.title: Vivox Authorization Service - Go
repositories.description: Vivox authorization service template implemented in Go, providing secure token generation and seamless integration with AccelByte Gaming Services.

repositories.title: Vivox Authorization Service - C#
repositories.description: Vivox authorization service template implemented in C#, providing secure token generation and seamless integration with AccelByte Gaming Services.

repositories.title: Vivox Authorization Service - Java
repositories.description: Vivox authorization service template implemented in Java, providing secure token generation and seamless integration with AccelByte Gaming Services.

repositories.title: Vivox Authorization Service - Python
repositories.description: Vivox authorization service template implemented in Python, providing secure token generation and seamless integration with AccelByte Gaming Services.

title: Rank Suite
description: Elevate competitive play with the Rank Suite, a comprehensive, tiered weekly player ranking system for AccelByte Gaming Services (AGS). It manages MMR-based player rankings, offering real-time updates and consistent weekly evaluations to foster a dynamic and engaging competitive environment.
creator: AccelByte

repositories.title: Extend Rank Suite
repositories.description: The core Extend Rank Suite service, implemented in Go, comprising three integrated services to power advanced MMR-based player ranking functionalities within AccelByte Gaming Services.

title: Core Matchmaker
description: Gain precise control over your game's player pairing with the Core Matchmaker, an Extend Override application designed for customizing matchmaking functions. This solution features a gRPC server with integrated security (authentication/authorization), comprehensive observability (metrics, traces, logs), and a foundational sample implementation to efficiently match two players, ensuring optimal game experiences.
creator: AccelByte

repositories.title: Extend Core Matchmaker
repositories.description: The Core Matchmaker service, implemented in Go, provides a powerful Extend Override solution for customizing game matchmaking, complete with built-in security and observability features.

title: Challenge Suite
description: Empower your game with dynamic engagement using the Challenge Suite. This solution allows game developers to implement daily missions, seasonal events, quests, and achievements via simple JSON configuration, eliminating the need for custom backend code. It integrates with AccelByte Gaming Services (AGS) for secure authentication, efficient event processing, and streamlined reward distribution, enhancing player retention and experience.
creator: AccelByte

repositories.title: Extend Challenge Suite
repositories.description: A comprehensive utility repository providing essential tools and configurations for running, testing, and managing the Extend Challenge applications within your development environment.

repositories.title: Extend Challenge Common
repositories.description: A foundational shared library containing critical domain models and interfaces, ensuring consistency and interoperability across all components of the Extend Challenge Suite.

repositories.title: Extend Challenge Service
repositories.description: The core REST API service for the Challenge Suite, featuring gRPC and HTTP Gateway implementations to handle all challenge-related requests, event triggers, and data management.

repositories.title: Extend Challenge Event Handler
repositories.description: A dedicated event processing service built with gRPC, efficiently managing and responding to game events to trigger challenge progress, status updates, and reward disbursements.

repositories.title: Extend Challenge Demo App
repositories.description: A practical command-line interface (CLI) and text-based user interface (TUI) tool designed for demonstrating and rigorously testing the functionalities of the Extend Challenge Suite.

title: Profanity Filter
description: Maintain a positive and respectful in-game environment with the Profanity Filter. This essential tool efficiently scans and identifies messages containing blacklisted words, helping to moderate content and enhance player experience by curbing offensive language.
creator: GGWP

repositories.title: Profanity Filter
repositories.description: A Profanity Filter service, implemented in Go, designed to efficiently detect and flag messages containing blacklisted words, ensuring a clean and respectful communication environment within your game.

title: MMR Calculator
description: Evaluate and update player skill ratings with the MMR Calculator. This service processes match results, intelligently adjusting player MMR based on nuanced factors like team performance, composition, and underdog dynamics. Integrated with AccelByte's Statistics service, it ensures robust MMR persistence and accurate player progression tracking.
creator: AccelByte

repositories.title: Extend MMR Calculator
repositories.description: A prime example of an Extend Service Extension, this sample application demonstrates how to accurately calculate and apply player MMR changes derived from straightforward match results, integrating seamlessly with AccelByte Gaming Services.

title: Gacha Suite
description: Unleash engaging monetization and progression with the Gacha Suite. The Alphabet Gacha example within this suite showcases comprehensive game logic, including idle earnings, strategic upgrade purchases, captivating gacha mechanics, and a rewarding prestige system. This service integrates with AccelByte Gaming Services (AGS) for robust wallet management, secure cloud saves, and detailed player statistics, providing a complete solution for modern idle-gacha experiences.
creator: AccelByte

repositories.title: Alphabet Gacha Extend Service
repositories.description: The backend Extend Service Extension for the Alphabet Gacha game, implementing core idle earnings, upgrade, gacha, and prestige system logic, fully integrated with AccelByte Gaming Services.

repositories.title: Alphabet Gacha Extend Service
repositories.description: The companion game client for the Alphabet Gacha Extend Service, providing the frontend experience for players interacting with the idle earnings, upgrades, gacha, and prestige systems.

title: EOS Voice Integration
description: Facilitate seamless in-game voice communication with EOS Voice Integration. This Extend Event Handler mirrors AccelByte Session Service state into Epic Online Services (EOS) real-time voice rooms. By subscribing to session and party change events via Kafka Connect, it ensures room membership remains perfectly synchronized and delivers user-specific credentials through AccelByte Lobby notifications, enabling game clients to effortlessly join the appropriate EOS voice channels.
creator: AccelByte

repositories.title: Extend EOS Voice Integration
repositories.description: An Extend Event Handler that automates the creation of Epic Online Services (EOS) Voice rooms, synchronizing them with AccelByte Session Service whenever a new Party or Game Session is initiated.
